record.description: The picture shows the [Order of the] C Men in Hospital Unit 13, now at Fort McPherson, Georgia. The men from left to right are: standing, Kahn, class of 1920, football; Mahannah, class of 1917, wrestling; Bent, class of 1917, track and basket-ball; sitting, Fisher, class of 1917, track (captain) and football; Rochermel, class of 1917, basket-ball; Rouse, class of 1920, football; Hart, class of 1917, baseball (captain); and Higgins, class of 1919, track and football.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: See UC Magazine, March 1918, pp.191. Photographer stamp. Corners and edges broken off.
